item.title: FuboTV 诉迪士尼和媒体巨头的反垄断审判将于 2025 年 10 月开始
item.description: 根据周四提交的一份法庭文件，FuboTV 针对华特-迪士尼（Walt Disney）、福克斯（Fox）和华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）推出新的体育流媒体服务的反垄断审判将于明年 10 月 6 日开始。【原文：FuboTV's antitrust trial against the launch of a new sports streaming service by Walt Disney , Fox and Warner Bros Discovery is set to begin on Oct. 6 next year, according to a court filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞价本周反弹指日可待，中国数据大爆炸迫在眉睫
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局（FAA）局长将在参议院波音公司监督小组作证
item.description: 联邦航空管理局局长将于9月25日在参议院常设调查小组委员会就飞机制造商对波音公司的监督问题作证，该委员会的一名助手告诉路透社记者。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration will testify on Sept. 25 before the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations on the planemaker's oversight of Boeing , a committee aide told Reuters.】

item.title: 西方石油公司的 1PointFive 获得美国能源部高达 5 亿美元的资助
item.description: 西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum）的碳捕集与封存部门 1PointFive 周四表示，美国能源部清洁能源示范办公室已承诺提供高达 5 亿美元的资金，用于支持其南得克萨斯州直接空气捕集 (DAC) 中心的开发。【原文：Occidental Petroleum's carbon capture and sequestration unit 1PointFive said on Thursday that the U.S. Department of Energy's Office of Clean Energy Demonstrations has committed up to $500 million to support the development of its South Texas Direct Air Capture (DAC) Hub.】

item.title: 美国法官允许大选投注，打击市场监管机构
item.description: 周四，一名联邦法官为美国人利用衍生品押注美国大选结果等事件扫清了道路，给监管市场的监管机构造成了又一次打击。【原文：A federal judge on Thursday cleared the path for Americans to use derivatives to bet on events such as the outcome of U.S. elections, dealing another blow to the regulator overseeing the market.】

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会主席告诉波音公司首席执行官：飞机制造商存在安全文化问题
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会主席对波音公司新任首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）说，这家飞机制造商 "存在安全文化问题"，必须加以解决。【原文：The chair of the National Transportation Safety Board told new Boeing Co CEO Kelly Ortberg that the planemaker "has a safety culture problem" that must be addressed.】

item.title: 备忘录称，高盛聘请梅丽莎-戈德曼（Melissa Goldman）为技术合伙人
item.description: 根据路透社周四看到的一份备忘录，高盛聘请梅丽莎-戈德曼（Melissa Goldman）担任其全球银行和市场部门的合伙人兼全球技术工程主管。【原文：Goldman Sachs has hired Melissa Goldman as a partner and global head of technology engineering for its global banking and markets division, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: Adobe 预测季度盈利不佳，科技支出谨慎
item.description: Photoshop 制造商 Adobe 周四预测第四季度盈利低于分析师预期，表明在经济形势严峻的情况下，竞争激烈，对其人工智能集成编辑工具的需求疲软。【原文：Photoshop maker Adobe forecast fourth-quarter earnings below analysts' estimates on Thursday, signaling stiff competition and soft demand for its AI-integrated editing tools amid challenging economic conditions.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院撤销庞氏骗局案中对蒙特利尔银行 5.64 亿美元的判决
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行（Bank of Montreal）周四说服美国一家上诉法院，撤销了陪审团对其子公司做出的 5.64 亿美元的裁决，该子公司在明尼苏达州被定罪的商人汤姆-彼得斯（Tom Petters）经营的约 36.5 亿美元的庞氏骗局中扮演了重要角色。【原文：Bank of Montreal persuaded a U.S. appeals court on Thursday to throw out a $564 million jury verdict against a subsidiary over its role in an approximately $3.65 billion Ponzi scheme run by convicted Minnesota businessman Tom Petters.】

item.title: 美国运输工人工会与西南航空公司签署飞行模拟器技术人员临时协议
item.description: 美国运输工人工会（Teamsters）第 19 分会周四发表声明说，该分会已与西南航空公司达成一项为期四年的临时协议，将飞行模拟器技术人员的工资提高 23%。【原文：Teamsters Local 19 has reached a four-year tentative agreement with Southwest Airlines that provides a 23% wage increase to flight simulator technicians, the union said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 预计第三季度新增 Max 用户超过 600 万
item.description: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 预计，随着其 Max 流媒体平台在国际市场上继续保持良好的发展势头，第三季度将新增 600 多万订户。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery expects to add more than 6 million subscribers to its Max streaming platform in the third quarter, as the service continues to build momentum in international markets.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团否认兴登堡关于瑞士银行冻结资金的评论
item.description: 印度阿达尼集团（Adani Group）周四晚些时候表示，在兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）表示当局已冻结该公司超过 3.1 亿美元的资金作为洗钱和证券造假调查的一部分后，该公司没有卷入瑞士法院的任何诉讼程序。【原文：India's Adani Group said late on Thursday it has no involvement in any Swiss court proceedings after Hindenburg Research indicated that authorities had frozen more than $310 million of the company's funds as part of a money laundering and securities forgery investigation.】

item.title: 谷歌知道出版商会不喜欢广告技术变革，但这一变革却帮助它获利
item.description: 据周四在这家科技巨头的反垄断庭审上出示的内部文件显示，谷歌知道出版商在 2019 年采取措施防止他们将广告销售转给竞争对手时会反对，这促使谷歌试图让这一改变看起来更容易接受。【原文：Google knew publishers would balk when it took measures in 2019 to keep them from diverting ad sales to competitors, prompting it to try to make the change look more palatable, according to internal documents shown at the tech titan's antitrust trial on Thursday.】

item.title: 联合太平洋铁路公司称受飓风弗朗辛影响的线路已恢复铁路服务
item.description: 美国联合太平洋铁路公司（Union Pacific）周四表示，受飓风弗朗辛影响的所有铁路线均已恢复服务，但提醒有货物通过受影响地区的客户可能仍会遇到延误。【原文：U.S. railroad Union Pacific said on Thursday that all of its rail lines impacted by hurricane Francine have been restored to service, but cautioned that customers with shipments moving through the impacted area may still experience delays.】

item.title: 亚利桑那州关键铜矿之争有望左右美国大选
item.description: 美国原住民对力拓和必和必拓的 Resolution Copper 矿山的反对可能会对 2024 年美国总统在亚利桑那州的投票起到关键作用，这也凸显了在能源转型过程中开采关键矿产的最佳地点问题上的高度紧张。【原文：Native American opposition to Rio Tinto and BHP's Resolution Copper mine could prove crucial for the 2024 U.S. presidential vote in the battleground state of Arizona, underscoring the high tension over where best to extract critical minerals for the energy transition.】

item.title: OCC 对富国银行采取执法行动
item.description: 美国货币监理署（U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency）周四表示，已对富国银行（Wells Fargo）采取执法行动。【原文：The U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency said on Thursday it had issued an enforcement action against Wells Fargo .】

item.title: 巴菲特的保险业领袖 Ajit Jain 出售伯克希尔公司的大部分股份
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）长期担任保险业高管的阿吉特-詹恩（Ajit Jain）本周出售了其持有的该企业集团一半以上的 A 类股。【原文：Ajit Jain, the longtime top insurance executive at Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway , sold more than half of his Class A shares in the conglomerate this week.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构将就新的 "勾选大小 "规则进行表决
item.description: 周四的一份日程安排公告显示，华尔街最高监管机构将于下周就允许股票定价增量小于一美分的新法规提案进行投票，这也是股票市场即将进行的结构性改革的一部分。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator is due to vote next week on proposed new regulations to allow the pricing of stocks in increments of less than a penny, part of a pending structural overhaul of equities markets, a Thursday scheduling announcement showed.】

item.title: 美国航空公司空乘人员批准与航空公司签订新合同
item.description: 美国航空公司专业空乘人员协会周四表示，美国航空公司的空乘人员已经批准了一份为期五年的新合同。【原文：American Airlines flight attendants have ratified a new five-year contract with the airline, the Association of Professional Flight Attendants said on Thursday.】

item.title: 亚马逊将司机工资提高 7
item.description: 亚马逊公司周四表示，将把司机的工资提高到每小时 22 美元，比去年增加 7%。【原文：Amazon.com to hike drivers wages to $22 per hour, a 7% increase over last year, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: OpenAI 推出具有 "推理 "能力的新系列人工智能模型
item.description: 微软支持的 OpenAI 周四表示，它正在推出一系列人工智能模型，旨在用更多的时间处理解决棘手的问题。【原文：Microsoft-backed OpenAI said on Thursday it was launching a series of AI models designed to spend more time processing to solve hard problems.】

item.title: 裕信银行收购德国商业银行在德国引发争论
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）收购德国商业银行的开局之举重新引发了关于德国银行业未来的讨论，促使柏林暂停出售该银行的股份，并将目光转向德意志银行，将其视为可能的竞争对手。【原文：UniCredit's opening gambit in a takeover play for Commerzbank has rekindled a debate about the future of German banking, prompting Berlin to pause selling shares in the lender and turning the spotlight on Deutsche Bank as a possible rival suitor.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期固定利率抵押贷款降至 6.20
item.description: 由于预期美联储将于下周三开始降息，本周美国抵押贷款利率有所下降，但由于房价依然高企，降息可能不会立即提振房地产市场。【原文：U.S. mortgage rates dropped this week on expectations that the Federal Reserve would start cutting interest rates next Wednesday, but will likely not offer an immediate boost to the housing market as home prices remain elevated.】

item.title: 解说员：工会规则为波音美国工人罢工设置了高门槛
item.description: 波音公司周五可能面临 3 万多名工人的罢工，罢工可能导致其西雅图地区的飞机工厂停产，因为工人们要求的加薪幅度高于工会领导人同意的四年加薪 25% 的水平。【原文：Boeing faces a likely strike on Friday by more than 30,000 workers that could shutter its Seattle-area plane factories over demands for a bigger pay increase than the 25% over four years that union leaders agreed to.】

item.title: 美国家庭财富因房地产收益达到创纪录的 163.8 万亿美元
item.description: 美联储周四公布的数据显示，受房地产价值上涨和股市上涨的推动，上一季度美国家庭财富增至163.8万亿美元，创下新纪录。【原文：U.S. household wealth rose last quarter to $163.8 trillion, a fresh record, driven by gains in real estate values as well as a rise in the stock market, data from the Federal Reserve showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国众议院通过针对中国的法案，限制电动汽车税收抵免
item.description: 美国众议院周四以微弱优势投票通过了一项立法，收紧了对符合美国电动汽车税收抵免条件的汽车中中国成分的限制规定。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives narrowly voted Thursday to approve legislation to tighten rules limiting Chinese content in vehicles qualifying for U.S. electric vehicle tax credits.】

item.title: 微软任命前通用电气首席财务官为运营总监
item.description: 微软周四任命通用电气前财务主管卡罗琳娜-戴贝克-哈佩（Carolina Dybeck Happe）为首席运营官。【原文：Microsoft on Thursday named former GE finance chief Carolina Dybeck Happe as chief operations officer.】

item.title: 独家：印度调查发现亚马逊和沃尔玛旗下 Flipkart 违反反垄断法
item.description: 调查人员说，这些公司创建了一个生态系统，使首选卖家在搜索结果中出现率更高。【原文：Investigators said the companies created an ecosystem where preferred sellers appeared higher in search results.】

item.title: Charter 免费添加华纳兄弟 Discovery 的流媒体服务
item.description: Charter Communications 与华纳兄弟探索频道周四表示，Charter Communications 将免费提供华纳兄弟探索频道的 Max 流媒体服务和 Discovery+，这可能会扩大这家有线电视和宽带公司的用户群。【原文：Charter Communications will provide Warner Bros Discovery's Max streaming service and Discovery+ at no additional charge, the companies said on Thursday, potentially boosting the cable and broadband company's user base.】

item.title: 美国财政部报告 8 月份预算赤字 3,800 亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部周四报告称，8 月份联邦预算赤字为 3800 亿美元，与总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）撤销学生贷款豁免计划后 2023 年 8 月出现的 890 亿美元盈余相比发生了巨大变化。【原文：The U.S. Treasury on Thursday reported a $380 billion federal budget deficit for August, a massive shift from the $89 billion surplus in August 2023 that resulted from the reversal of President Joe Biden's student loan forgiveness program.】
